participant_1.background:
I love Halloween because it's a time to be creative and have fun.
I met a lot of new people at the welding classes I've been taking.
my favorite band is bon over.
I'm not rich, but I think it would be fun to try my luck at horse racing.
I love to spend my time listening to Katy Perry while I track my bets.

participant_2.background:
I keep my surroundings clean and read to keep my mind sharp.
I want to use my skills to help people in need.
I'm going to re-read Anne of Green Gables, but I won't be sharing it with my mom.
I would chew my food slowly as a kid and my dad would always tell me to hurry up.
I have always enjoyed the company of animals in fantasy fiction books, but I do not have any pets of my own.

content.text: What are your thoughts on Halloween?
I think Halloween is a silly holiday, but I do enjoy the fun costumes and candy.
I agree, it's a fun time to be creative! I love coming up with new and interesting costumes.
What are some of your favorite Halloween costumes?
One year I dressed up as a zombie cheerleader, and another year I was a giant panda.
Those sound like fun costumes! I've always wanted to be a mermaid, but I don't think I'd have the patience to make the tail.
Mermaid costumes are really cool! I've seen some really impressive ones online.
I think I'm more of a fairy or princess type of girl.
Those are great choices too! I love all the pretty dresses and accessories that come with those costumes.
Me too! I love getting all dressed up for Halloween. It's the one day of the year I can really let my imagination run wild.
Me too! I think Halloween is the best holiday
